Post.title: Js
Post._content:
### Js

#### 

```
<script language="javascript">
 	window.location.href='https://www.baidu.com'
</script> 
```

#### 

```
<script language="javascript">
 	window.history.back(-1);
</script>  
```

#### 

```
<script language="javascript">
 	window.navigate("top.jsp");
</script>  
```
 **IE**

#### 

```
<script language="javascript">
 	self.location='top.htm';
</script>     
```

#### 

```
<script language="javascript">
 	top.location='xx.jsp';
</script>  
```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

---
title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: Vue
Post._content:
### Vue - - npm install vue-router - ``` import Vue from 'vue' import VueRouter from 'vue-router' Vue.use(VueRouter) ``` - vue-router ```

Hello App!

Go to Foo Go to Bar

``` - ``` const routes = [ { path: '/foo', component: Foo }, { path: '/bar', component: Bar } ] ``` - router ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes // routes: routes }) ``` - ``` const app = new Vue({ el:'#app', router }) ``` - vue-routerhash,url:http://localhost:8000/#/hello #,history history.pushState APIurl ``` const router = new VueRouter({ mode: 'history', routes: [...] }) ``` url::http://localhost:8000/hello history,,404 - - apache .htaccess(index.html) ``` RewriteEngine On RewriteBase /ibms/ RewriteRule ^index\.html$ - [L] RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d RewriteRule . /ibms/index.html [L] ``` apache - nginx ``` location / { try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html; } ``` - IIS :IIS ``` ``` 404, ``` const router = new VueRouter({ mode: 'history', routes: [ { path: '*', component: NotFoundComponent } ] }) ``` - - routes /a /b ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes: [ { path: '/a', redirect: '/b' } ] }) ``` ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes: [ { path: '/a', redirect: { name: 'foo' }} ] }) ```
Post.raw:
--- title: Vue date: 2020-3-10 tags: [es6] --- ### Vue - - npm install vue-router - ``` import Vue from 'vue' import VueRouter from 'vue-router' Vue.use(VueRouter) ``` - vue-router ```

Hello App!

Go to Foo Go to Bar

``` - ``` const routes = [ { path: '/foo', component: Foo }, { path: '/bar', component: Bar } ] ``` - router ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes // routes: routes }) ``` - ``` const app = new Vue({ el:'#app', router }) ``` - vue-routerhash,url:http://localhost:8000/#/hello #,history history.pushState APIurl ``` const router = new VueRouter({ mode: 'history', routes: [...] }) ``` url::http://localhost:8000/hello history,,404 - - apache .htaccess(index.html) ``` RewriteEngine On RewriteBase /ibms/ RewriteRule ^index\.html$ - [L] RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d RewriteRule . /ibms/index.html [L] ``` apache - nginx ``` location / { try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html; } ``` - IIS :IIS ``` ``` 404, ``` const router = new VueRouter({ mode: 'history', routes: [ { path: '*', component: NotFoundComponent } ] }) ``` - - routes /a /b ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes: [ { path: '/a', redirect: '/b' } ] }) ``` ``` const router = new VueRouter({ routes: [ { path: '/a', redirect: { name: 'foo' }} ] }) ```
